typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		messageId as string,
		deviceId as string,
		temperature as double,
		humidity as double,
		EventProcessedUtcTime as string,
		PartitionId as string,
		EventEnqueuedUtcTime as string,
		IoTHub as (MessageId as string, CorrelationId as string, ConnectionDeviceId as string, ConnectionDeviceGenerationId as string, EnqueuedTime as string)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> iotcontainer
iotcontainer split(temperature > 25,
	temperature <= 25,
	disjoint: false) ~> split@(temperaturegreater, temperatureless)
split@temperaturegreater sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['rdbms.jason'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> RDBMS
split@temperatureless sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['mongodb.jason'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink2
